name: Inter-Dimensional Monster Jumper
description:
Jump and fall through infinite parallel dimensions!
Slay all the monsters to unlock the next arena!
WASD to move
Space x2 to double jump
Left click to shoot

CREDITS:
evilscotsman - Programming, Level Design
birdybird (Kristin B) - Art, Models, Textures
bighugejake (Jake Marks) - Music, Sounds
heiach - Art
mchones - Project Management (lol)
